body_html:
@tylergenter this is so sad to hear! A reminder for all of us to hit the backup button this evening..
I can imagine what you must be feeling, and sure enough you are not ready to start all over again - not right now at least. On the other hand there are dozens of people willing to help, so if by any chance you find time to put together some instructions for the community of what needs to be done, I am sure people will gather around and offer you as much help as needed in reproducing what you've achieved. Would you be able to help coordinate this process?

@tylergenter this is so sad to hear! A reminder for all of us to hit the backup button this evening..
I can imagine what you must be feeling, and sure enough you are not ready to start all over again - not right now at least. On the other hand there are dozens of people willing to help, so if by any chance you find time to put together some instructions for the community of what needs to be done, I am sure people will gather around and offer you as much help as needed in reproducing what you've achieved.
